author: George
content: I inspect vessels all of the time and get called out for identifying plastic trash cans in stateroom’s, galleys, laundry rooms etc. Plastic cans are lighter and easier to clean than metal cans. They do make composite cans that are fireproof.

author: Peter Wright
content:
“Polyethylene trash cans are a known fire risk, and new Subchapter T boats are required to have noncombustible waste receptacles in all compartments. Conception was an older vessel and was exempt from this standard.”

Why? This is so basic and costs only a few dollars.
